text: Rising Sun is a 1993 American action mystery thriller movie directed by Philip Kaufman and was based on the 1992 novel of the same name by Michael Crichton. It stars Wesley Snipes, Harvey Keitel, Sean Connery, Mako, Keith Anderson, Ray Wise, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Tia Carrere, Peter Crombie, Steve Buscemi, Amy Hill, Matt LeBlanc, Alexandra Powers, Tylyn John and Clyde Kusatsu. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1993 action movies Category:1993 thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:1990s mystery movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Philip Kaufman Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about suicide Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Japan
title: Rising Sun (movie)
